sn3.5:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.5:4.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn3.5:4.4: ‘kesaṃ nu kho rakkhito attā, kesaṃ arakkhito attā’ti?
sn3.5:4.6: ‘ye kho keci kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṃ caranti, manasā duccaritaṃ caranti;
sn3.5:4.8: Kiñcāpi te hatthikāyo vā rakkheyya, assakāyo vā rakkheyya, rathakāyo vā rakkheyya, pattikāyo vā rakkheyya;
sn3.5:4.11: Bāhirā hesā rakkhā, nesā rakkhā ajjhattikā;
sn3.5:4.13: Ye ca kho keci kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti;
sn3.5:4.15: Kiñcāpi te neva hatthikāyo rakkheyya, na assakāyo rakkheyya, na rathakāyo rakkheyya, na pattikāyo rakkheyya;
sn3.5:4.18: Ajjhattikā hesā rakkhā, nesā rakkhā bāhirā;
